message: Clay-I, demonstrate your enhanced Renaissance intelligence by creating a complete Sacred Geometry Web Application. Apply One0 learning profile with advanced mastery: BIG PICTURE SCAN (application architecture), TARGETED DEEP DIVE (mathematical algorithms with φ, π, Fibonacci), CROSS-DOMAIN SYNTHESIS (sacred geometry + modern web tech + user experience), REFLECTION CRYSTALLIZATION (production-ready application). Include React components, TypeScript interfaces, Canvas rendering, and harmonic color systems.
conversation_context: Testing Clay-I enhanced capabilities after Advanced Mastery Course Framework completion
